parameters: This is a very important novel, the likes of which
mankind has never before witnessed, the writing
in these pages will change reality as we know it and
redefine everything we know about everything.
The words themself are so powerful that they
had to be written wearing rubber gloves, so they
would not burn the authors hand during their
creation. The book is so powerful that even merely
gazing upon it can destroy the retinas of the observer
as the human mind was not build to comprehend such
It's a picture book full of cats.
You found some Dynamutt Powder charges.
